title: BMaaS — 02 Infrastructure & Hardware Health
description: Physical infrastructure monitoring: PSU health, power consumption, CDU cooling, leak detection, CPU thermal, SMART disk health, DPU/NIC, voltage rails, BMC status.

panels.title: PSU Input Voltage
panels.description: RF_Power_Supply_InputVoltage per PSU. Out of range = utility issue.

panels.title: CDU Liquid Flow Rate
panels.description: CDULiquidFlow — below minimum = reduced cooling capacity.

panels.title: CDU Supply Temperature
panels.description: CDULiquidSupplyTemperature — cold side entering the rack.

panels.title: CDU Return Temperature
panels.description: CDULiquidReturnTemperature — hot side leaving the rack. Rising = cooling deficit.

panels.title: CDU Differential Pressure
panels.description: CDULiquidDifferentialPressure — anomalies indicate blockage or pump failure.

panels.title: 🚨 Devices With Leaks
panels.description: DevicesWithLeaks — ANY > 0 = EMERGENCY. Follow facility leak procedures.

panels.title: Leak Sensor Faults
panels.description: LeakSensorFaultRack — sensor fault may MASK an actual leak.

panels.title: Disk Temperature
panels.description: smart_temperature — elevated temp = cooling or workload issue.

panels.title: CPU VCCIN Voltage
panels.description: RF_CPU1_VCCIN — CPU input voltage rail. Out of spec = power delivery issue.

panels.title: Hardware Profile Match
panels.description: hardware-profile data producer health check. FAIL = hardware configuration drift.
